name: Southern-Style Slaw with Pecans and Maple-Dijon Vinaigrette
description: Sweet and tangy with lots of crunch, this slaw is light and refreshing.
recipeIngredient: 5 scallions, white and green parts, finely sliced
1/2 cup chopped pecans, toasted if desired

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the Dijon mustard, maple syrup, vinegar, salt and pepper. Slowly drizzle the oil into the bowl, whisking constantly.
Add the coleslaw, bell pepper, scallions and chopped pecans to the bowl and toss with the dressing. Taste and adjust seasoning if desired. Cover and refrigerate for at least 20 minutes. Serve.
